Sentence: 28.8% of Americans have experienced excessive anxiety.
24.5% of Americans report feeling down, depressed, or hopeless.
Source: National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey

Sentence: 50.9% of Americans report feeling tired or low energy regularly.
Source: National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey

Sentence: 12.1% of Americans have experienced social phobia.
18% of Americans regularly have trouble concentrating.
Source: National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey

Sentence: 25.2% of Americans are bothered by a poor appetite or overeating regularly.
Source: National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey

Sentence: 36.7% of Americans have trouble falling or staying asleep or sleeping too much regularly.
Source: National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey

Sentence: 17.5% of Americans feel like a failure or like they have let themselves or their family down.
Source: National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey
